m_szDocTitle: Apple reports iPhone sales down, 1st revenue drop since 2003 - Sun Sentinel
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Apple reports iPhone sales down, 1st revenue drop since 2003 Privacy Policy Apple sold more than 51 million iPhones in the first three months of this year — and that's the problem. That's 10 million fewer iPhones than the tech giant sold during the same quarter a year ago. As a result, Apple on Tuesday reported its first drop in quarterly revenue in 13 years — and the first-ever year-over-year decline in iPhone sales.
